item.title: The English universities in the 17th century
item.description:
Picture: Magdalen College from Foster’s Alumni Oxeniensis

I have written a comprehensive overview of my paper “Teacher-directed change: The case of the English Scientific Revolution” here:

I‚Äôm happy to announce that my JMPüö®üö®Teacher-directed change: The case of the English Scientific Revolution‚Äù is now out as a working paper. Finalising the draft has been a lot of work. So, very happy to share this! For lots of history, new micro-data&natural experiments, read on pic.twitter.com/hTX2CKhj5C

I want to use this space to add some further reflections.
